fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Confiscate the weaponry of an authorized target during the night.
- Confiscate the weaponry of an unauthorized target during the night. 1 Use.
- Put on a bulletproof vest OR give a bulletproof vest to the Sentry (Power) during the night. 1 Use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Confiscating the weaponry of a target will roleblock them if they attack someone. You will be notified of this.
- When giving a bulletproof vest to a Sentry (Power), they will automatically put it on if attacked the same night, otherwise they may use it in conjunction with other night abilities to gain Basic Defense during the night.
- Roleblock Immunity.
